actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Concurrent resolution calling for the President to curtail exports of goods, materials, and technology to nations that restrict the flow of oil to the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should curtail exports of goods, materials, and technology to any nation that restricts the flow of oil to the United States.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution calling for the President to curtail exports of goods, materials, and technology to nations that restrict the flow of oil to the United States.
